mapper.select: select * from (select rownum as row, rnum, bnum, rname, rcontent, rgroup, rindent from (select bnum, rname, rcontent, rgroup, rindent from rbbs start with rGroup is null connect by prior rnum = rgroup order siblings by rgroup desc, rcdate desc, rnum desc) where rownum < = #{endRecord}) where row >= #{startRecord}
mapper.update: update rbbs set rcontent=#{rcontent} where rnum=#{rnum}

choose.when: update rbbs set rgood=rgood+1 where rnum=#{rnum}
update rbbs set rbad=rbad+1 where rnum=#{rnum}

mapper.select: select bnum,rnum, rgroup, rindent from rbbs where rnum = #{rnum}
select count(*) totalRec from rbbs where bnum=#{bnum}
